definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Electric machines are composed of stator and rotor.
sentences.chinese: 電機是由定子和轉子兩部分構成的。

sentences.english: Depending on the characteristics of products used and on the type of stators and rotors.
sentences.chinese: 根據產品使用特點及定子和轉子的類型確定流量。

sentences.english: Large stator-end cones for 000MW turbine generators.
sentences.chinese: 汽輪發電機定子端部大錐環。

sentences.english: Molds applicable to different stack height of stators .
sentences.chinese: 模具適用於不同積厚之定子。

sentences.english: This machine is specially designed for slot cell or wedge paper insertion of ceiling fan stators .
sentences.chinese: 本機適合吊扇馬達定子之絕緣紙或絕緣片插入。

sentences.english: The stator resides in the very center of the torque converter.
sentences.chinese: 定子居住在非常中心地帶的液力變矩器。

sentences.english: The article introduces a technique of medium frequency induction brazing in electrical machine's end to end joint sleeves of rotor.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一種發電機定子嵌線的中頻感應釺焊方法。

sentences.english: Protection device generator stator response to the accumulation of heat process.
sentences.chinese: 保護裝置能反應發電機定子的熱積累過程。

sentences.english: Have probed into its stator of windings and rotor winding design method.
sentences.chinese: 探討了其定子繞組和轉子繞組的設計方法。

sentences.english: The stator winding must be impregnated with insulation paint and dried before refitting.
sentences.chinese: 定子繞組在重新安裝前必須侵絕緣漆和烘乾。

sentences.english: The body height of rugby players in mauls tends to be very much higher than in scrums .
sentences.chinese: 身高橄欖球運動員在定子往往是非常遠高於血清。

sentences.english: The stator winding of power frequency withstand voltage test.
sentences.chinese: 定子繞組做工頻耐壓測試。

sentences.english: I handled them carefully before gluing them into the stator laminates.
sentences.chinese: 老子處理他們之前仔細粘合成定子層板。

sentences.english: The utility model belongs to the technical proposal of a stator winding machine.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型屬於一種定子繞線機技術方案。

sentences.english: The rotor and stator windings of N0.2 alternator should be varnished and baked as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 二號交流發電機的轉子和定子應儘快侵漆並烘乾。

sentences.english: The set of stator laminations is arranged into a stack.
sentences.chinese: 該組定子疊片被佈置成層疊或堆疊。
